author: aryanXmahajan
text:
how i closed fortune 500s without meaning to:

step 1: build cool shit for small clients
step 2: post about it casually  
step 3: enterprise lurker sees it
step 4: they DM saying "can you do this for us"
step 5: you think they're a startup
step 6: get on call in tank top at gym
step 7: they mention their team size is 40,000
step 8: you google them mid-call
step 9: "oh shit you're THAT company"
step 10: play it cool like you knew
step 11: throw random pricing that feels right
step 12: they say yes immediately
step 13: panic-deliver in 6 days
step 14: it works better than their 6-month vendors
step 15: they introduce you to boeing

the secret: treating enterprise like startups makes them feel young again

they're so used to being treated special that normal treatment is novel
